titles.title: A bill to amend the Food Security Act of 1985 to authorize a regional water enhancement program in the environmental quality incentives program.
Regional Ground and Surface Water Enhancement Program Act of 2007
Regional Ground and Surface Water Enhancement Program Act of 2007

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Agriculture, Nutrition, and Forestry.

bill.summary: Regional Ground and Surface Water Enhancement Program Act of 2007 - Amends the Food Security Act of 1985 to direct the Secretary of Agriculture to: (1) identify areas in which protecting or improving water quality or water quantity, or both, is a priority; (2) establish (within the environmental quality incentives program) a regional water enhancement program to improve agricultural water quality or water quantity; and (3) invite prospective partners to submit competitive grant proposals for regional water enhancement partnerships.
